ComicInfo.Summary:
DARKNESS MONTH CONTINUES! Part 4. The Darkness/Witchblade crossover concludes HERE! JACKIE ESTACADO--a broken man? As impossible as it seems, after months of battling the Angelus, a certain unnamed caped crusader, and a host of other baddies, even the power of the DARKNESS is not enough to protect him anymore. Instead, he must turn to the most unlikely ally of all for help... his power's ancient enemy, Sara Pezzini and the WITCHBLADE! Don't miss this momentous turning point in the life of the man known as the DARKNESS, the ramifications of which will be felt over the next year!
Jackie rips out Darkness part from Witchblade making it easier to control. Cull and Necrobi are defeated.
